scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test yarn knex migrate:latest && NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run && yarn run jest --runInBand
scripts.prepare:prod: NODE_ENV=production node init-db.js && NODE_ENV=production yarn knex migrate:latest && NODE_ENV=production knex seed:run
scripts.prepare:deva: NODE_ENV=development node init-db.js && NODE_ENV=development yarn knex migrate:latest && NODE_ENV=development knex seed:run
